sentences: Monteco Turner (born September 16, 1978), known mononymously as Monteco, is an American contemporary R&B singer who was active in the mid 1990s.
His first single "Is It Me?" was released in 1995, and features fellow contemporary R&B group IMx (then known as Immature).
Monteco released his eponymous second album independently in 1997; it also failed to chart.
